articles.title: Musk hails $16.5bn Samsung deal to supply Tesla with AI chips
articles.description: South Korean tech company will produce carmaker’s next-generation semiconductors at new plant in Texas

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge review: super thinness above all else
articles.description: Special featherweight, titanium edition of top Android has large screen but sacrifices battery and camera for design

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 review: great-looking and fun, but iterative Android
articles.description: Flagship flip folder fits even bigger screen in pocketable clamshell, with a larger cover display, slightly slimmer design and faster chip

articles.description: Super-slim frame, improved display, enhanced camera and plenty of power give the pricey phone-tablet hybrid a major upgrade

articles.title: Trump threatens 25% tariff on Apple and Samsung phones not made in US
articles.description: Announcement wipes about $70bn off Apple shares amid pressure on company to build smartphones in US

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 review: the smallest top-tier Android left
articles.description: Compact phone has flagship chip and buckets of AI, but hasn’t changed much from predecessors

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra review: still the superphone to beat
articles.description: Huge glass and metal slab packs super-fast chip, long battery life and unrivalled camera zoom, but its AI features are overhyped

articles.title: The best Android phones in 2025: flagship smartphones compared and ranked
articles.description: Our tech expert is back with an updated guide to the top-tier Android phones, from budget buys to the best for battery life

articles.title: The worst thing about AI? That stupid Samsung ad where the guy adds ‘way too much sugar’ to his pasta sauce | Emma Beddington
articles.description: Only a robot would attempt to turn it into ‘tasty cookies’. A human would just scoop the sugar out again, writes Emma Beddington

articles.title: ‘My cats are always grooming, chasing or cuddling’: Sagar Pavale’s best phone picture
articles.description: The India-based photographer worked quietly so that he didn’t disturb this blissful moment

articles.title: Acquittals Bring Samsung Chairman’s Decade of Legal Woes to an End
articles.description: ​The South Korean Supreme Court’s ruling dispels uncertainty​ over Lee Jae-yong’s leadership as the tech giant faces challenges from tariffs and chip making rivals.

articles.title: Three Billionaires Walk Into a Fried Chicken Restaurant
articles.description: Jensen Huang, the Nvidia chief executive, and the leaders of Samsung and Hyundai staged a regular-folks outing in Seoul before announcing a business deal.

articles.title: Han Jong-Hee, Samsung Electronics Executive, Dies at 63
articles.description: Mr. Han was co-chief executive and oversaw the company’s consumer electronics business since 2021.

articles.title: Trump Takes Aim at South Korean Chipmakers’ China Operations
articles.description: The U.S. said Samsung and SK Hynix could no longer ship American equipment to their production facilities in China without government licenses.

articles.title: Trump’s Threat to Hit Chips With 100% Tariffs Raises Big Questions
articles.description: The semiconductor supply chain is complex and global. And most chips come into the United States as part of electronics.

articles.title: Stellantis and Samsung Will Get $7 Billion to Build Battery Factories
articles.description: The loan, from the Biden administration, was designed to withstand Republican attacks and will be used to make electric-car batteries in Indiana.

articles.title: The Incredible Growing Refrigerator
articles.description: Modern units are not only much bigger than older ones, but also more efficient.

articles.title: Samsung Employees Return to Work After Strike Fails to Win Concessions
articles.description: The indefinite strike, the first in the electronics company’s history, comprised only a sliver of its labor force and lasted less than a month.

articles.title: Time-Saving New Phone Features You May Have Missed
articles.description: From photo timers to music identifiers, here are a few new iPhone and Android tools to make your life easier.

articles.title: Samsung Recalls 1 Million Stoves That Started 250 Fires and Killed Pets
articles.description: Thirty models of Samsung stoves were part of the recall over fires started by accidental contact.
